Name: Battle Imagine - Storm Goblin King
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Storm Goblin King's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Meteor Shower.

Arcane! Meteor Shower
Summon Boss: Storm Goblin King to release a meteor shower at the target, dealing Magic Damage. Upon the skill cast, your Luck and DMG dealt and healing of Luck effects are increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Storm Goblin King's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Meteor Shower.

Arcane! Meteor Shower
Summon Boss: Storm Goblin King to release a meteor shower at the target, dealing Magic Damage. Upon the skill cast, your Luck and DMG dealt and healing of Luck effects are increased for a period.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
